scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.servers: echo 'ðŸš€ SwiftNotes Server Management:' && echo '  npm run dev-auto  - Start both servers (Node.js)' && echo '  npm run dev-shell - Start both servers (Shell)' && echo '  npm run stop      - Stop all servers' && echo '  npm run status    - Check server status' && echo '  npm run health    - Test backend health'
